```{r}
library('lattice')
library('readxl')

dat <- read_excel('Psychopharmaka_Data.xlsx')


dat <- dat[order(dat$Jahr), ]


stripplot(order(dat$Jahr) ~ Jahr, data = dat, 
          panel = 
            function(x, y, subscripts, ...) {
              panel.grid(h = -1, v = -1)
              lsegments(x0 = x, y0 = y - 0.2, 
                        x1 = x, y1 = y - 0.6,
                        lwd = 3)
              ltext(x = x, y = y, 
                    labels = dat$Substanz[subscripts])
              }, 
          xlim = c(1945, 2015), 
          ylab = '')

```
